title: GVMC Uses AI To Catch And Fine Public Litterers
description: GVMC commissioner Ketan Garg announced that the city is now under daily surveillance using drone cameras and Artificial Intelligence (AI), marking a significant advancement in tech-enabled civic enforcement.

title: Two federal judges say use of AI led to errors in US court rulings
description: (Reuters) -Two federal judges admitted in response to an inquiry by U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley that members of their staff used artificial intelligence to help prepare recent court orders that Grassley called "error-ridden."

title: Artificial intelligence: Benefits, risks and potential interventions
description: WHILE the idea of artificial intelligence (AI) emerged more than a century ago, it is only in the last decade that AI has become part of daily conversation with the advent of ChatGPT and similar tools as well as the possibility of such conveniences as autonomous vehicles, smart homes and self-learning machines. With AI also being used to address globally impactful modern challenges such as climate change, it is never too late to revisit and review the advantages and risks of AI.

title: IBM's slowing cloud growth eclipses upbeat Q3 results
description: IBM on Wednesday recorded a slowdown in growth in its key cloud software segment, overshadowing booming artificial intelligence (AI)-driven demand for the company’s new mainframe that pushed third-quarter (Q3) sales and profit above market estimates.
content: IBM on Wednesday recorded a slowdown in growth in its key cloud software segment, overshadowing booming artificial intelligence (AI)-driven demand for the company’s new mainframe that pushed third-quarter (Q3) sales and profit above market estimates.... [2032 chars]

title: Reddit sues Perplexity for scraping data to train AI system
description: SOCIAL media platform Reddit sued artificial intelligence startup Perplexity in New York federal court on Wednesday, accusing it and three other companies of unlawfully scraping its data to train Perplexity's AI-based search engine.
content:
SOCIAL media platform Reddit sued artificial intelligence startup Perplexity in New York federal court on Wednesday, accusing it and three other companies of unlawfully scraping its data to train Perplexity's AI-based search engine.

title: Amazon uses AI to enhance its warehouse robots
description: (UPDATE) MILPITAS, California — Amazon on Wednesday said it is speeding up the automation of its warehouses with the help of artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics, raising questions about the future of human workers.

title: Microsoft introduces new Copilot features such as collaboration, Google integration
description: Microsoft on Thursday introduced new features in its digital assistant Copilot such as collaboration and deeper integration with other services like Outlook and Google, beefing up its artificial intelligence service to stave off a hit from its competition.
content:
Other AI service providers such as Anthropic and OpenAI are upgrading their models and launching products aimed at capturing a wider share of the booming AI market.

title: Meta to cut 600 jobs in its AI division
description: (UPDATE) NEW YORK — Facebook owner Meta is cutting 600 jobs in its artificial intelligence (AI) division in a move intended to streamline operations after an aggressive hiring spree, United States media reported Wednesday.
content:
— Facebook owner Meta is cutting 600 jobs in its artificial intelligence (AI) division in a move intended to streamline operations after an aggressive hiring spree, United States media reported Wednesday.

title: Microsoft AI CEO: We’re making an AI that you can trust your kids to use
description: By Clare Duffy, CNN New York (CNN) — Popular artificial intelligence chatbots like ChatGPT and Meta AI are increasingly blurring the line between real-world and digital relationships by allowing romantic and sometimes sexual conversations — while scrambling to make sure children aren’t accessing that adult content.
